resources.string: He wants to take you on a date…
Maybe I\'ll give him a chance
So, what do you want to do?
Movie and Bourbon on the Rocks
cause some mischief, run from the police, and eat junk food
meet for classy cocktails and go dancing
devour some sushi paired with white wine
go rock climbing and enjoy a picnic
watch a movie and drink bourbon on the rocks
Don\'t lie to yourself. He\'s hot!
Text message already sent. Please restartApp.
So why\'s this app so cute?
Welcome to Get Her Number my good man! Use this app while you\'re having a fun and flirtatious conversation with a cute girl (this will give you the best results).\nHere\'s how it works:
Bring up mobile apps in coversation \nHint: \"So have you downloaded any cool apps lately?\"
Open this app on your phone, hand it to the cutie standing in front of you, and tell her to press the button.
Sit back while she laughs and gives you her phone number!
Disclaimer: We do not guarantee she will give you her number or give you a valid number. This app is meant to be a tool in the confident and charismatic man's tool belt.
This app will send her a cute text message once a phone number is entered. We need your permission to do this.
Clicking this icon will take you back to the beginning.
